text: He nabi! Mumina narigana yakhana apanara kache kache ese ba'iâ€™ata kare [1] e marme ye, tara allahara sathe kono sarika sthira karabe na, curi karabe na, byabhicara karabena, nijedera santanadera hatya karabe na, tara sajnane kono apabada racana kare ratabe na ebam satkaje apanake aman'ya karabe na, takhana apani tadera ba'iâ€™ata grahana karuna ebam tadera jan'ya allahara kache ksama prarthana karuna. Niscaya allaha ksamasila, parama dayalu
